channel.title: Can I combine Whonix-Gateway CLI with Whonix-Workstation XFCE? Yes!
channel.description:
**Yes!**
Both Whonix CLI and Whonix XFCE exist.
Technically, both Whonix-Gateway-CLI with Whonix-Workstation-XFCE are using virtual network `Whonix`. That's why these can be easily, seamlessly combined.
----
**Whonix headless**
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox/CLI
----
**Whonix** **XFCE**
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox/XFCE
----
https://forums.whonix.org/t/user-poll-xfce-vs-kde-kde-deprecation-considered/6235
----
**Non-Qubes-Whonix vs Qubes-Whonix**
* This announcement mostly concerns [Non-Qubes-Whonix](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Non-Qubes-Whonix). * Qubes-Whonix is largely unaffected because Qubes' desktop environment choice (XFCE vs KDE) relies on dom0. Qubes-Whonix default applications will <s>most likely</s> change from KDE to those associated with XFCE; to learn how [Qubes-Whonix](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Qubes) is affected see [this mailing list thread](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/qubes-devel/pkvvm1WNznY).
